Thread Pointer

Thread pointer to facilitate tools/RTOS support of thread local storage

Thread Pointer
Selected

If the option is selected, your Xtensa core will include an additional 32-bit register called THREADPTR (user register 231). This is a dedicated register that will be used by the target Linux OS to support thread-local storage in NPTL (the Native POSIX Thread Library).
